summary:
The Kinetao - grim Souls - returned to Tamriel. The Darkness is consuming the whole Land. And it is insatiable. Let them devour your soul - and become Heartless.
Incredible atmospheric and stylised enb. Dark and desaturated, cold and unwelcoming. One of the few really atmospheric ENBs on the nexus
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][size=5][i][b]Heartless Kinetao[/b] [/i]ENB[/size][/center]


[i][b][center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58979-1-1413819042.jpg[/img][/center][/b][/i]
[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58979-2-1413819042.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]Heartless Kinetao ENB is a preset based on my last enb. So there is not so much difference. I tried a more unique and balanced look for this enb.[/center]


[center]___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Imagine Skyrim as the cold and lifethreatening Province it represents in the lore of Elder Scrolls. A cold, grim and unforgiving
place on nirn, where only the fittest are able to survive in the wilderness, while only the richest survive in the small civilized
cities and settlements among the endless roads that lead through the province. This is the enb that came to my mind. It is dark
and seems uninviting. But once the cold engulfs your mind with this finetuned enb,
you will embrace the immersion like never before.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]





[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58979-1-1413821747.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58979-3-1413821747.jpg[/img][/center]



Requiered files:

Download 0.132 binaries from enbdev.com
[url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0132.htm]right here[/url]
and take the d3d9.dll file from the wrapper version.

Installation:
just put the fx files in the download and the binaries into you skyrim main folder.
Once you start skyrim there should be a message in the upper left corner.

make sure you completely wiped your skyrim folder from every single enb / sweet fx   left over or this preset is probably getting messed up 




[size=3][b][u]knows graphical issues[/u][/b][/size]

Fire /  - intense bloom  :


for example : [url=http://minus.com/i/CsaOPND5PVkr]picture by "Kuzimar"[/url]

 
 - you may have extremely bright bloom and lens effects.
If you experience eye-crippling flares by looking at a fire,
I recommend to take use of the "H-K fire patch" file in the "optional" file section

Since I do not experience any of these issues and even double-checked
the download files I need to rely on your feedback if you experience these bugs

--------------------------------------------------------






Give a shot to the pictures section and if you enjoy this enb, submit your own screenshots :D

[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/58979-2-1413821747.jpg[/img][/center]
author: LaBeatBeatbox
